entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 01:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 01:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 01:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
